amendment.description: To amend title II of the Immigration and Nationality Act to reform the diversity visa program and create a program that awards visas to aliens with an advanced degree in science mathematics, technology, or engineering.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4114 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 42. Record Vote Number: 147.

action.text: Amendment SA 4114 proposed by Senator Gregg. (consideration: CR S5066-5072, S5092; text: CR S5067) To amend title II of the Immigration and Nationality Act to reform the diversity visa program and create a program that awards visas to aliens with an advanced degree in science mathematics, technology, or engineering.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4114 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 42. Record Vote Number: 147.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4114 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 42. Record Vote Number: 147.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4114 proposed by Senator Gregg.
